content: Pauline Catriona Haddow - NTNU Pauline Catriona Haddow Download press photo Download press photo Download press photo Foto: Kai T. Dragland / NTNU Close Pauline Catriona Haddow Professor Department of Computer Science pauline@ntnu.no +4773594458 Drivhuset IT-bygget, sydfløy Gløshaugen, Trondheim About Pauline Haddow leads the CRAB lab, which is part of the Artificial Intelligence Group.
